mapper.select: select count(*) from food where name = #{name}
select * from food order by searchCount DESC limit 0, 30
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food ( fd_no, name, calories, carbohydrate, fiber, protein, fat, sodium, sugar, gdegree ) VALUES ( #{fd_no}, #{name}, #{calories}, #{carbohydrate}, #{fiber}, #{protein}, #{fat}, #{sodium}, #{sugar}, #{gdegree} )
mapper.update: UPDATE food SET fd_no = #{fd_no}, name = #{name}, calories = #{calories}, carbohydrate = #{carbohydrate}, fiber = #{fiber}, protein = #{protein}, fat = #{fat}, sodium = #{sodium}, sugar = #{sugar}, gdegree = #{gdegree} WHERE fd_no = #{fd_no}
UPDATE food SET searchCount = searchCount + 1 WHERE fd_no = ${fd_no}
